name: A-10 VR
description: A-10 VR is a fresh virtual reality take on a classic sci-fi gallery shooter. Hone your sharp shooting skills in 4 game modes against a stunning outer space landscape in this arcade shooter meant for all skill levels! Fit with both global and local leaderboards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 /Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: WOW!!!  This is the perfect example of an arcade shmup realised in virtual reality.  There are a couple of other titles in this genre already on the market but this one is by far my favourite. The weapons are simple but with a great feeling of power. One is a one hit instagib type railgun, the other is a slower full auto plasma gun.   The way to get high scores is by not missing so put the railgun in your dominant hand and when you have time line up your shots for maximum combo scores. When things get out of hand (and they do, oh boy they do) spray and pray with the plasma gun.  Its a simple game with no story and very little depth, but for the same price as a pint this is amazing value for money. Well done dev for putting a realistic price on your title. And well done for making something that is polished and perfectly playable.  9/10

This game is WAY above the 5 dollars worth, i got it for 27 pesos or around 1.25 dollars and im ashamed, get this game. I might even buy a copy for a friend to give this developer some dollars back up, do yourself a favor and get this gem.
WOW! Arcade style shooter with bonuses , points and lot´s of different enemies! Looks great as well with good graphics and explosions. This game is awsome! For 5 bucks it´s a must have

I have just started playing this but damn its fun.... Single player life span i cant imagine would be to long being a wave shooter(but an insanely fun one with a soundtrack that reminds me of old arcade shooter games with more base following the tempo of the game.  Where i think this will shine (and ill be trying it out on friends this weekend) will be in a party /vr gathering situation where the competition will have you ducking driving side stepping faster and harder to beat those scores..  At a steam summer sale price it is now YOU WOULD BE CRAZY TO NOT BUY IT!!
What an amazing arcade shooter and the price! It's a no brainer. The graphics are spot on and the game play very good. It looks very polished.
A fun arcade shooter, well worth the price. I play this when I'm tired of getting shot at in SPT, and want to shoot at stuff that is running away from me.

This game looks simple and boring BUT you are wrong!! New 'ATTACK Mode' which they just updated June 17th is the BEST MODE!!! Difficulty is very very balanced and maneuver your body while shooting at the same time is so BRILLIANT!. Hope other game developer learn from this guy about how to make full use of Vive! I highly recommend this game to everybody and really really give you good workout without getting repetitve gameplay. Space Pirate Trainer game is a joke compare to this game!

A-10 VR is a very simple target shooter game without very much content. It's not bad for a few bucks but if you spend a little more there's much more compelling VR content available. After playing for less than half an hour I feel like I've already seen everything it has to offer.
Great game that I use for demoing the vive to friends. Worth the price.

This is a must buy. Right now my top VR game. Shooting is excellent, and just when I thought that was great, I got to Attack Mode where you have to dodge laser beams. This is an intense full body experience.

I like this game for a number of reasons; it's a well made science fiction themed arcade shooter.  You have a pair of pistols and you blast things out of the sky. It's retro sexy. And the games don't go one forever, so it you have a group over to try out VR, everyone gets a try. And it's cheap!  Instant classic.
